com.github.triceo.splitlog

Class DefaultLogWatchBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.triceo.splitlog.api.LogWatchBuilder
      • com.github.triceo.splitlog.DefaultLogWatchBuilder

  • public final class DefaultLogWatchBuilder
extends LogWatchBuilder
    Prepares an instance of LogWatch. Unless overriden by the user, the instance will have the following properties:
    Default gating condition
    SplitlogMessagesRejectingCondition.
    Default storage condition
    AllFollowerMessagesAcceptingCondition.
